A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This writing was beyond bad...

1. Ships that can go to light speed\, but not catch a ship at normal speed? 

2. Ships running out of fuel? I don't ever recall a ship ever having to be refueled in any previous Star Wars...you would think their tech at this point would be nuclear power\, I mean come on your blowing up entire planets.

3. Finding the master code breaker?? Really?? Why doesn't this guy work for the empire in the first place? Or the rebellion?

4. Main stream movie stars in Star Wars have no place...what's next? Bruce Willis as the next Jedi with no shoes...

5. This movie just sucks...
